attributes.action: Open book exams  for GCSE and A-level students sitting exams in 2021
attributes.additional_details: Exams need to be adapted for the students sitting 2021 exams (a level and gcse) as they have missed. A lot of education during the pandemic
attributes.background: To allow open book exams for GCSE and A-level students sitting exams in 2021 as they have missed a lot of education during the current Pandemic issue “covid-19”
